answers.answer: There are many things that you can do to help prevent- here's an article that might be helpful-http://www.medhelp.org/diabetes/articles/10-Ways-to-Sidestep-Diabetes/188Have you had any symptoms?  Are you worried about having some risk factors?

Reading that article is a great suggestion. Also, you can try asking this question in our Prevention and Prediabetes Community:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Diabetes-Prevention--Pre-Diabetes/show/1393(you may have to cut and paste the link). Thanks!

question: I do not want to deal with this, I have enough to deal with
